content: The biggest secret lies directly to the right of the Turtle Island Shrine when facing toward the front, but it will require you to have obtained the Loong Scales back in Chapter 2 behind a wall you can crack where the First Prince of Flowing Sands is summoned.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Turtle Island'.
The content is as follows:
The biggest secret lies directly to the right of the Turtle Island Shrine when facing toward the front, but it will require you to have obtained the Loong Scales back in Chapter 2 behind a wall you can crack where the First Prince of Flowing Sands is summoned.
